alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 12:41PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, central Duval and southeastern Charlton Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. George, or 8 miles southwest of Callahan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Cisco Gardens, St. George, Bryceville, Nassau Village-Ratliff, Ratliff, Oceanway and San Marco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
